column2: "Na orifi asɔrfi mu no

column6: abo akɛse bi nye aban akɛse bi so!"

column2: "Na Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Ehu aban akɛse yi? Wonnkegya ɔbo kor a ɔda kor do a wonnkodwuruw egu famu."

column2: "Na ɔtse Ngo Bepɔw no do wɔ asɔrfi tsentsendo no
column3: Peter
column5: John nye Andrew bisaa no nsumaa mu dɛ
column7: "Kyerɛ hɛn aber a iyinom bɛyɛ hɔ: na sɛ iyinom nyina rebɛba mu a

column2: "Na Jesus hyɛɛ ase see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ yie amma obi aanndaadaa hom."

column2: "Na dodowara bɛba wɔ me dzin mu dɛ
column3: Emi nye no

column2: "Na sɛ hom tse ko nye akosɛm a
column3: mma hom akoma nntu: na otwar dɛ ɔba

column2: "Na ɔman bɔsoɛr ɔman do
column3: na ahenman bɔsoɛr ahenman do; na asaasewosow bɛba mbeambea

column2: "Na hom nhwɛ homho yie: na wobeyi hom akɔ mpanyimfo bagua mu
column3: na wɔahwe hom wɔ nhyiamudan mu
column4: na hom egyina ambradofo nye ahemfo enyim wɔ me ntsi

column2: "Na asɛmpa no
column3: otwar dɛ wɔka kyerɛ amanaman nyina ansaana."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔdze hom rokɔ ekeyi hom ama a
column3: mma hom nndwendwen dza hom bɛka ho ansaana: na biribi a wɔdze bɛma hom dɔn no mu no
column4: ɔnoara na hom nka: osiandɛ nnyɛ hom na hom kasa

column2: "Na nua beyi nua ama owu
column3: egya beyi ɔba ama; na mba bɔsoɛr wɔ awofo do na wɔama woeku hɔn."

column2: "Na nyimpa nyina bɛtan hom wɔ me dzin ntsi; na nyia ɔbɛtsena mu ekodu ewiei no
column3: ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa."

column2: "Na sɛ hom hu amambɔe ekyiwadze no dɛ ogyina mbrɛ ɔnnsɛ a (ma nyia ɔrekenkan no ntse ase dɛ ogyina hɔ ma ohonyi no)
column3: ɔno na hɔn a wɔwɔ Judea no nguan nkɔ nkokwaa do;"

column2: "na mma nyimpa a ɔwɔ dan etsifi nnsian mmba dan mu
column3: na eso mma ɔnnhɛn mu nnkɛfa biribi wɔ ne dan mu;"

column2: "na mma nyia ɔwɔ haban mu no nnsan n’ekyir bio mmbɛfa ne nkatado."
"Na hɔn a wɔafa efur nye hɔn a wɔma numfo wɔ nda no mu ndue!"
"Na hom nsɔr ma iyinom aammba awɔwber mu."
"Na nda no mu bɛba ahohiahia kɛse a ofitsi Nyankopɔn ne wiadze mbɔe ahyɛse araa bodu aber no ɔmmbaa dɛm da
column3: eso bi remmba da."

column2: "Na sɛ Ewuradze enntwa nda no do tsia a
column3: nkyɛ honam biara nnkenya nkwa
column4: na ne mpamufo a ɔpaa hɔn no ntsi oetwa nda no do tsia."

column2: "Na aber no sɛ obiara se hom dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column11: nye nkɔnhyɛfo atorfo bɔsoɛr na wɔakyerɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze a sɛ anhwɛ a

column2: "Na hom dze
column3: hom nhwɛ yie: osiandɛ medzi kan aka ne nyina akyerɛ hom."

column2: "Na dɛm ahohiahia nda no ekyir no
column3: ewia bɛhyɛ sum

column2: "na nworaba fi sor bɔtotɔ
column3: na sor etum bɔwosow."

column2: "Ɔno na wobohu nyimpa Ba no dɛ ɔreba wɔ nsuwusiw do
column3: wɔ tum nye enyimnyam kɛse mu."

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔbɔsoma n’abɔfoe ma wɔaakɔboaboa ne mpamufo no ano efi mframa anan no mu
column3: ofi asaase ano kesi sor ano."

column2: "Hom nsua adɔmbadua no ho bɛ no:  sɛ n’abaw yɛ momon
column3: na oriyi ahaban a
column4: nna hom nyim dɛ ɔhyewber abɛn;"

column2: "dɛmara na hom so sɛ hom hu dɛ yinom yɛ hɔ a
column3: hom nhu dɛ abɛn

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: Mbasantsen yi nnkotwa mu akɔ gyedɛ yinom nyina ayɛ hɔ ansaana."

column2: "Ɔsor nye asaase botwa mu akɔ na me nsɛm dze
column3: wonnkotwa mu akɔ da."

column2: "Na da no nye dɔn no dze obiara nnyim: abɔfo a wɔwɔ sor no so nnyim
column3: Ɔba no so nnyim

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie
column3: hom nweɔn na hom mbɔ mpaa
column4: na hom nnyim da pɔtsee a ber no bodu."

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ nyimpa a ɔrodɔ mu a ogyaa ne fi
column3: na ɔmaa no nkowaa tum
column4: na ɔmaa hɔn nyina hɔn edwuma nkorkor
column5: na ɔhyɛɛ abowanohwɛfo no dɛ ɔnweɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nweɔn
column3: na hom nnyim dɔn kor a ofiwura bɛba: adansaber o
